last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 1
last_episode_to_air.overview: Barry the boss has to arrange a funeral with over 1,000 mourners despite the body still being in Florida.

name: Don't Drop the Coffin
overview: Documentary series delving behind the closeted world of the undertaker, focusing on south London funeral directors FA Albin and Sons, who have made death their business for more than 200 years. At times funny, at times bizarre, at times moving, this is a rare insight into the profession of death.
